s: ^Aw, hey! My day just got better because I ran into you!

Chat1: ^Lila?Smiling "Well you always know where to find me; five days a week. Four seasons a year!"
^Lila?Smiling "Oh! I even helped Mrs Lee get a volunteering position here."

s: ^That's great for both of you! You must really enjoy it here if you're bringing other people in!
^That's awesome. I ran into Mrs. Lee earlier too; I know the two of you are friends.

Chat2: ^Lila?Smiling "I really do. I enjoy the people and I believe in the work."

s: ^That is very sweet. You were close with Eddie, right?
^Nice! Speaking of Mrs. Lee... I could use your help.

Chat3: ^Lila?Smiling "Yeah! We were neighbors growing up. We did the whole "walking to school together" thing as kids."

s: ^Awww. Do you think it would be okay, then,  if I asked you to help Mrs. Lee?
^That's so sweet! Can I ask you for something regarding Eddie and Mrs Lee?

Explain1: ^Lila?Smiling "Ohh yes! I haven't seen her yet this morning, I've been so busy running around. I usually see her before her aerobics class."
^Lila?Smiling "She's really been coming out of her shell recently... being around other people definitely helps. She's okay, right?"

s: ^She needs some encouragement speaking up for herself at the pharmacy.

Explain2: ^Lila?Neutral "I see, yeah. Oh, Mrs Lee. She needs encouragement stepping into her power. She can do hard things, but I understand that she doesn't really feel it though."

s: ^It's so nice to hear you pump her up like this.

Suggestion1: ^Lila_Day 1_Mrs. Lee could ask Lila to pick up the prescription for her_Mrslee1-1

Suggestion1.#: notification Lila_Day 1_Mrs. Lee could ask Lila to pick up the prescription for her_Mrslee1-1

Suggestion1: ^Lila?Neutral "I know this is her medical anxiety acting up."
^Lila?Smiling "I need to pick up a prescription for Trisha tonight; can I pick up Eddie's prescription up for Mrs. Lee?
^Lila?Smiling "Have her stop by and give me the information, if that would help. "

s: ^I'm not sure she would be comfortable with that... maybe a pep talk instead?
^That would help her feel better about today, but what about next time?

Suggestion2: ^Lila_Day 1_Mrs. Lee could ask Lila to come to the pharmacy with her so she has support asking clarifying questions_Mrslee1-2

Suggestion2.#: notification Lila_Day 1_Mrs. Lee could ask Lila to come to the pharmacy with her so she has support asking clarifying questions_Mrslee1-2

Suggestion2: ^Lila?Smiling "Maybe she needs some in-person support; in that case, I'm happy to go with her. She can do this, but I can be her cheerleader!"

s: ^I think having you with her would make Mrs. Lee feel more confident.

Goodbye: ^Lila?Smiling "Sounds good. I can take a break from here whenever!"

s: ^You're a great friend, Lila. Thank you.
